title: Who was Mahar in the ancient period? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mahars served as local ruler for the mauryan kings.They were also in the army of Emperor Ashoka but most of mahar during ashoka Maurya reign followed and reverted to buddhism central India mahar served as local rulers.They are nagvanshi kshyatriyas and their gotra is Tak kshyatriyas as of same like Mauryaas. Mahar includes clan with titles like Wasnik,Dhargav,Maurya. this all titles lasts today also.Mahar mostly follow emperor ashoka .
